bibl.title: P.Brit.Col. Inv. 1 and Invitations to Sarapis Dinners
bibl.note: P. Vancouver Univ. Libr. [P. Brit. Col.] Inv. 1. The papyrus is housed in Rare Books and Special Collections (RBSC) at the University of British Columbia (UBC) Library in Vancouver. Invitation to a Sarapis Dinner. Oxyrhynchus?, II CE. - Table 1: Papyrus Invitations to Sarapis Dinners and Related Texts; - Table 2: Papyrus Invitations to Secular Dinners.
